text:
See also Question ID 441 - Microplastics for further information on microplastics and to Question
ID 440 - Pollutants emissions - disaggregation to better understand the disaggregation level
needed when reporting on pollutant emissions.
Supporting material
Regulation (EU) 2024/1244 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 24 April 2024 on
reporting of environmental data from industrial installations, establishing an Industrial Emissions
Portal and repealing Regulation (EC) No 166/2006.
